name: Rob “P1” Whitaker (@RobW@iosdev.space)
summary:
I had a Captcha today that had ai generated images - this is not new. But the prompt was also clearly ai generated, as it made zero grammatical sense.
Refreshing the page was the only option, as refreshing the captcha gave the same prompt with different images.
How is solving problems a computer can solve far easier than a human a good way to determine the user isn’t a computer?
